# Omnitools

<i>Miscellaneous functions in short forms.</i>

# Hierarchy
```
omnitools
'---- p()
```

# Example

## python
```python
from omnitools import *

# print and always flush buffer
p("abc")
# abc
# 
```

## shell
```shell script
rem omnitools.exe <function name> [argument] ...
omnitools.exe p abc
```
